com.infostretch.labs.utils

Class ActionUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.infostretch.labs.utils.ActionUtil

  • public class ActionUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    ActionUtil is the class that provides the common logic for actions to handle the validation and conversion.
    Author:
    Mohit Dharamshi

    • Method Detail

      • validateForm

        public static boolean validateForm(java.lang.String newName,
                                   java.lang.String originalJob)
        Validates if desired new name of converted job does not exist at current level.
        Parameters:
        newName - Desired new name of the pipeline job to be created (optional).
        originalJob - Full name of original job that will be converted.
        Returns:
        Returns true if a job with desired new name does not exist.

      • doConvert

        public void doConvert(org.kohsuke.stapler.StaplerRequest request,
                      org.kohsuke.stapler.StaplerResponse response)
               throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                      java.io.IOException
        Calls Transformer class with request parameters and creates new pipeline job from XML.
        Parameters:
        request - StaplerRequest object from the form.
        response - StaplerResponse object that re-directs to newly created job.
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException - If a servlet encounters difficulty; servlet exception is thrown.
        java.io.IOException - If an input or output exception occurred.

      • defineName

        public static java.lang.String defineName(java.lang.String name,
                                          java.lang.String jobName)
        Creates new name of pipeline job if none is specified.
        Parameters:
        name - Desired new name of the pipeline job to be created (optional).
        jobName - Current job name against which to compare.
        Returns:
        A non-null value for new name of pipeline job.
